column5: Anyone know what time the resturants open in Ear falls and Vermillian Bay on Saturdays and Sundays? Thanks
Who cares< What time do the fish start biting? Nothing like a shore Breakfast, a little walleye with your eggs, Yummy

I think the restaurants are open all night and day? No fish in the bay so you have to eat out often! Don't rely on the fish in Vermillion Bay, bring enough money so you can eat a nice fish fry at the local restuarant
I don't know about Vermillion Bay, but if I remember right from last year, the Trillium in Ear Falls opens fairly early on Saturday. I think about 7:00. I'm not sure if they are open on Sunday.
They are open on Sundays. I believe that they are open by at least 6AM if not earlier. They close about 8PM
